text: Very good sushi. I order from here every time I crave sushi and don't feel like leaving the house. Also very reasonable prices.
Beau Bon pas trop Cher, c est un comptoir pour emporter et non un restaurant.

Very small but the best sushi in town. I recommend to call them to place your order , they have a 20% discount for take away. For 2 people we often order the 32 pieces chef's choice combo. They also have bubble tea.
